doc.title: Benny Hill: Laughter and Controversy
doc.plot: A profile of the life of Benny Hill with contributions from Benny Hill himself and leading lady Louise English; Hill's Angel Sue Upton; film legends Mickey Rooney, Burt Reynolds and Michael Caine; co-stars Henry McGee, Bob Todd and Bella Emberg; Eugene Chaplin (son of Charlie Chaplin); Hill's agent and manager Richard Stone; news anchorman Walter Cronkite; The Benny Hill Show producer/director Dennis Kirkland, and many others.
